feed.title: Lake Superior (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Lake Superior (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:42 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Superior Provincial Park 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Temperature: -9.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -14.5°C
Wind: W 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Flurries and local snow squalls. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
